action.des: Defensive Substitution: Alex Cintron replaces center fielder Gary MatthewsJr. , batting 3rd, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Jesus Feliciano replaces Chris Carter, batting 4th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Jonathan Malo replaces first baseman Fernando Tatis, batting 5th, playing second base.
Pitcher Change: Kiko Calero replaces Hisanori Takahashi, batting 6th, replacing left fielder Frank Catalanotto.
Defensive switch from second base to left field for Russ Adams.

atbat.des: Mike Morse grounds out, third baseman Mike Cervenak to first baseman Alex Cintron.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Pedro Lopez replaces Sean Burnett.

atbat.des: Pedro Lopez lines out to pitcher Kiko Calero.
Chris Coste pops out to first baseman Alex Cintron.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Tyler Walker replaces Sean Burnett, batting 1st, replacing right fielder Roger Bernadina.

Pedro Lopez remains in the game as the second baseman.

atbat.des: Russ Adams pops out to shortstop Eric Bruntlett.
Mike Cervenak called out on strikes.
